attributes.action: instruct the administrators of the petition site to give petition creators a right of reply to the responses they receive to their petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I've just received a response to a petition I created but the response raised more questions than it answered.  It also made at least one statement which was, of course, true but the action which was stated to be possible is actually rarely, if ever!, applied.

rejection.details: We have noted the contents of the petition but will treat it as feedback.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
